Cæstuses, silver dagger, halberd, hooked throwing knife, backpack, bandages, winter blanket, fishing hooks ×12,
fishing string, incense sticks ×12, soft leather pouch, iron rations (1 week), silk rope (50-ft.), small sack, tinderbox,
torches ×3, wineskin (full), writing stick, and 1d4+1 gold pieces.
